dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Halt! What business do you have in these cursed lands?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to end the darkness that plagues this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: End the darkness, you say? Bold words from a mere mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will do what it takes to bring light back to this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Light? There is no place for light in these shadows. You will regret crossing paths with me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't back down, even in the face of darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn till the end. Very well, face the icy embrace of death!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. Let's part ways then.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. Your choice seals your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: How can we find a way to coexist in this realm?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? There is no coexistence with the likes of you. Mortals are nothing but fuel for the eternal darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to accept such a fate. We must find a way to understand each other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding? Mortals are beyond comprehension. You will learn that the hard way.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. I won't disturb your domain any further.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise decision. Leave before the shadows claim you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to offer a truce between our kind. Will you consider it?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A truce? Your kind never fails to amuse. There can be no truce, only the inevitable.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to give up hope for peace. Let's find a way to coexist.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hope is a fleeting concept, mortal. Your optimism will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see. Then I will leave you to your darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave, and do not return. This realm has no place for your kind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am merely passing through. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No harm? Your presence alone taints the very air with your mortal stench.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will continue on my way and avoid any confrontation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise decision. Your scent will not linger for long in these forsaken lands.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If my presence disturbs you, I shall depart at once.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Depart, and do not return. Your kind brings nothing but discord.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no time for idle chatter. Step aside, creature.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Idle chatter? You dare speak to me in such a manner? Prepare to face the consequences of your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not waste my breath further. Let actions speak instead.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Actions indeed speak louder than words. Prepare for the frosty embrace of death.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let us part ways with no further discussion.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Part ways we shall, but remember that the shadows always watch.
